info.author: Martijn Pieters
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Zope Public License
Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Dynamic Content :: Page Counters
info.description:
Zope, and most CMS-es in fact, is not optimized to write on every page access. 
This makes page counters impractical. Add a squid cache and most visits won't 
even be seen by your CMS.

Linktally utilizes your Squid, Apache or Zope log file to periodically tally 
content accesses. A separate tool then provides rankings (by type if need be) 
for the past week, month and year.
info.name: linktally
info.summary: Keep track of your most popular CMS content
info.html_description:
Zope, and most CMS-es in fact, is not optimized to write on every page access. This makes page counters impractical. Add a squid cache and most visits won’t even be seen by your CMS.

Linktally utilizes your Squid, Apache or Zope log file to periodically tally content accesses. A separate tool then provides rankings (by type if need be) for the past week, month and year.
